name: Woody Woodpecker Racing
description:
Woody Woodpecker Racing is a racing-arcade game developed by Syrox Developments. It came out on 01-01-2000. It was published by Konami. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Woody Woodpecker Racing on PlayStation, Game Boy Color and PC.
Derek Poon and Eveline Cureteau produced the game. Matt Furniss scored the game.
